posts.post_title: FS: T205s SGC Graded All Sold
posts.post_content:
Hello friends.  The following T205s are for sale.  Please add $2 to help with confirmed shipping.  PP friends/family preferred.  Cash/Check/MO fine.

Apologies for the less than stellar pics.

Jones (Hassan) SGC 60 sold
Herzog (Sovereign) SGC 50 sold
Hartsel (Piedmont) SGC 40 sold
Livingston (SC 42) SGC 40 sold
Chance (Polar Bear) SGC 40 sold

Thank you very much for looking!

Best,

Andy

I will take a chance on Chance!
Andy...Can you hold until I get out of work tonight?
I will contact you then...

No worries Brian.  Talk to you later on.

Best,

Andy
